thread.title: Meet The World’s Oldest Street Artist…Her Craft? Yarn!
thread.title_full: Meet The World’s Oldest Street Artist…Her Craft? Yarn! | Breaking News & Headlines

author: Graham Finley
title: Meet The World’s Oldest Street Artist…Her Craft? Yarn!
text:
When you assume about what you want to do in your old age, it likely does not consist of sneaky acts of street vandalism. But this 104-year-old lady in Scotland spends her free time adding a dash of colour to towns with a small assist from her knitting needles.
Grace Brett is a member of a secret yarn-bombing club called “Souter Stormers” who have covertly covered public spaces in Selkirk, Ettrickbridge, and Yarrow with their adorable works of wooly art. She just thinks it makes the towns “look beautiful,” and we couldn’t agree more.
video-player-present
(by way of Mental Floss)
Just goes to show you need to by no means underestimate your dear old grandma. She may possibly have so considerably extra up her sleeve than that hanky.
